Sniper/Rhinox/Scorponok/Zergling/BH/Blastrage


Sniper finds a seat in the war room. "This room is getting filled" He 
sits there wating for the meeting to start.

Rhinox sits wating for the meeting to start.

Scorponok sits in his room wating to be called.

Zergling wonders why didn't Zardus call him. Ohhh well probally needs 
me to guard the base. "Autoguns and Automissles on. Sheilds up." 
Zergling sit in the bridge just wating.


BH and Blastrage heads back to their base. They go inside. 
BH:"Autoguns and Automissles up. Landmines on. Sheild up. Cloaking 
device on."BH makes sure everything is on. "Now no one should bother 
us."
Blastrage:"Hehe. Commander, I'm going to my room if you need me."
Blastrage heads off towards his room. BH sits in the command chair.
He 
slowly falls asleep in his chair. The computer stays on 24-hour alert.


(I hope my charater don't get killed while I'm gone!!!!)
